name: ⚧️ Cognizance
description:
Trans awareness week, Nov. 13th-19th, draws attention to the factors of discrimination that Tran Men, Trans Women, and non-binary entities face on a daily basis.
Concluding with Trans Day of Remembrance on the 20th honoring the lives and memory of our siblings who fell victim to violent transphobia.

"Please, just respect our existence"
"Stop Hating Us"
"STOP KILLING US"
